mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_info(ordNo, ordDate, memId, ordName, ordReceiver, ordAddress, ordHP, ordMsg, ordPay, ordPrice, ordState) VALUES(#{ordNo}, #{ordDate}, #{memId}, #{ordName}, #{ordReceiver}, #{ordAddress}, #{ordHP}, #{ordMsg}, #{ordPay}, #{ordPrice}, #{ordState})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM order_info WHERE memId = #{memId} ORDER BY ordNo DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM order_info WHERE memId = #{memId} ORDER BY ordNo DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_product (ordNo, prdNo, ordQty) VALUES (#{ordNo}, #{prdNo}, #{ordQty})
